titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for 2 years the tax-free distributions from individual retirement plans for charitable purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 456.

bill.summary: 10/30/2007--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2009 the exemption from tax penalties for premature distributions from retirement plans made for charitable purposes.
